articles.title: Veteran TVB actress-host Samantha Chuk dies aged 55 - AsiaOne
articles.description: Veteran TVB artiste Samantha Chuk has died of lung cancer at age 55. In a Facebook post on Wednesday (March 2), TVB Entertainment News said the Hong Kong actress-host died at home in her sleep on Tuesday night surrounded by family. [embed]https://www.facebook…
articles.content:
Veteran TVB artiste Samantha Chuk has died of lung cancer at age 55.

articles.title: White people at much higher risk of most cancers in England, study finds - BBC.com
articles.description: But preventable cases of the disease could surge in black and Asian groups, analysis suggests.
articles.content:
Image source, Getty Images
Black, Asian and mixed-heritage people are much less likely to develop cancer than white people, in England, an analysis suggests.
